00007 template <class T> T
00008 MAX(T a, T b)
00009 {
00010         return (a > b) ? a: b;
00011 }

00014 template <class T> T
00015 MIN(T a, T b)
00016 {
00017         return (a < b) ? a: b;

00027 template <class T> void 
00028 MAXMIN(const T* L, long n, T& max, T& min)
00029 {
00030         long i1, i2, i, j;
00031         T x1, x2;
00032         long k1, k2;
00033 
00034         i1 = 0; i2 = 0; min = L[0]; max = L[0]; j = 0;
00035         if((n % 2) != 0)  j = 1;
00036         for(i = j; i < n; i+= 2) {
00037                 k1 = i; k2 = i+1;
00038                 x1 = L[k1]; x2 = L[k2];
00039                 if(x1 > x2)     {
00040                         k1 = k2;  k2 = i;
00041                         x1 = x2;  x2 = L[k2];
00042                 }
00043                 if(x1 < min) {
00044                         min = x1;  i1 = k1;
00045                 }
00046                 if(x2 > max) {
00047                         max = x2;  i2 = k2;
00048                 }
00049         }
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 // Finds the max element in an array returns the index and the value in the parameter
00054 template <class T> long 
00055 FINDMAX(const T* L, long n, T& max)
00056 {
00057         long i, max_index = 0;
00058         T temp_max;
00059 
00060         if (n < 1) 
00061                 return 0;
00062 
00063         temp_max = *L;
00064 
00065         for (i=1; i<n; i++) {
00066 
00067                 if (*++L > temp_max) {
00068                         temp_max = *L;
00069                         max_index = i;
00070                 }
00071         }
00072 
00073         max = temp_max;
00074 
00075         return max_index;
00076 }
00077 
00079 template <class T> void
00080 INPLACESWAP(T& a, T& b)
00081 {
00082         a ^= b; b ^= a; a ^= b;
00083 }
00084 
00085 // In place swap doesn't work for float point types
00086 template <class T> void
00087 SWAP(T& a, T& b)
00088 {
00089         T tmp = b;
00090         
00091         b = a;
00092         a = tmp;
00093 }
00094 
00095 template <class T> double 
00096 MeanAverage(const T* L, long n)
00097 {
00098         double total = 0.0;
00099 
00100         for( int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00101                 total += *L++;  
00102                         
00103         return total / n;
00104 }

00108 template <class T> int
00109 ArrayReverse(T *array, long size)
00110 {
00111         if(array == NULL)
00112                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00113 
00114         long mid_element = (size / 2) - 1;
00115 
00116         for (int i=0; i <= mid_element ; i++)
00117                 SWAP(array[i], array[size - 1 - i]);
00118 
00119         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00120 }
